text: Ra jaba mariyamako chora isa(alaihis'salama)le bhaneh ki he mero kauma bani isra'ila! Ma timi sabaiko lagi allahabata patha'i'eko rasula hum . Mabhanda pahileko kitaba tauratako ma pramanita garnevala chu ra mapachi a'une e'uta sandesta jasako nama ahamada hunecha, unako subhagamanako subhasandesa suna'umchu. Ani jaba uni tiniharuko pasama spasta nisaniharu li'era a'e, taba tiniharule bhanna thale ki yo ta spasta jadu ho
